trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_SEQ_00<tab>The look in Minfilia's eyes is equal parts trepidation and determination.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_TODO_01<tab>Search for Minfilia.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_TODO_02<tab>Search for Thancred.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_000<tab>(-Minfilia-)I can sense her presence, albeit faintly.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_001<tab>(-Minfilia-)Come on, let's look over by the crystal wall.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_010<tab>(-Minfilia-)She was here. On the top of this building...
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_020<tab>(-Minfilia-)<groan>
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_021<tab>(-Minfilia-)What happened? I remember speaking with Minfilia...and then...
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_022<tab>(-Minfilia-)Is something wrong?
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_A1_000_001<tab>Your hair, it's changed.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_A1_000_002<tab>Your eyes, they've changed.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_023<tab>(-Minfilia-)A parting gift, I think.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_024<tab>(-Minfilia-)Until now, I've walked the path she set before me. The path she set before all the Minfilias.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_025<tab>(-Minfilia-)But she's given me a new path─a new life─that I can call my own.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_026<tab>(-Minfilia-)And even though she's gone, I can still feel her...warm and calm and gentle.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_027<tab>(-Minfilia-)I can feel the beating heart of the world, the Light that swells within it.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_028<tab>(-Minfilia-)And the Lightwardens. There's one here in Amh Araeng.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_029<tab>(-Minfilia-)Let's hurry back. The others need to know.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_030<tab>(-Minfilia-)You don't think Thancred will be angry with me, do you?
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_A2_000_001<tab>It's what Minfilia wanted. I'm sure he'll understand.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_A2_000_002<tab>There's only one way to find out.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_031<tab>(-Minfilia-)I'd like to think so too, but... <sigh>
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_032<tab>(-Minfilia-)<sigh> I know there's no getting around it, but...
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_033<tab>(-Minfilia-)Would you mind going on ahead? I'll be right behind you. I promise.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_RYNE_000_035<tab>(-Minfilia-)I just...need a moment to think.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>You're back! We were beginning to worry about you.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_ALISAIE_000_045<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank the gods you're all right.
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_URIANGER_000_050<tab>Thou art returned. But where is Minfilia?
TEXT_LUCKMD115_03620_YSHTOLA_000_055<tab>Welcome back. I see you fared better than Thancred.
